data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Stillwater Cove, California, USA (SWC001)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Stillwater Cove, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using a StowAway XTI Temperature Logger (Onset Computer Corp. XTI32-05+37) beginning 2010-03-04. The instrument depth was 021 meters, in an overall water depth of 22 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
